{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Taskmaster Grom |image = Portrait Generic Ogre Guard Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Taskmaster Grom.png |caption = |race = Wilder |subrace = |creature = Ogre |gender = Male |culture = |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 13 |MIG = 20 |CON = 18 |DEX = 8 |PER = 8 |INT = 10 |RES = 16 |health = 420 |damage = 26-35 {{crush}} |accuracy = 76 |penetration = 10 |deflection = 52 |fortitude = 82 |reflex = 38 |will = 68 |dr = 8 |dr crush = 4 |dr pierce = 12 |dr burn = 12 |dr corrode = 4 |ability = [Resistance: Intellect Afflictions](/resistanceIntellectAfflictions/), [Weakness: Dexterity Afflictions](/weaknessDexterityAfflictions/), [Sea Shanty](/seaShanty/), [Throw Jug](/throwJug/), [To the Depths](/toTheDepths/) |location = [Crookspur Dungeons](/crookspurDungeons/) |quests = [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/)
[Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/)
[Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Large Iron Key](/largeIronKey/) |internalname = CRE_Ogre_Taskmaster |guid = afd9622f-119f-4817-8db9-94c040a57737 }} '''Taskmaster Grom''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Grom is the pitiless ogre executioner of the Crookspur slaver port. He revels in his job and routinely torments captives with threats of death and mock executions. Nothing thrills him so much as the inevitable, periodic slave uprisings. After putting down such a revolt, the slavers turn to him to execute the ringleaders to discourage future resistance from the chattel. The executioner is not known for killing his victims quickly or cleanly, and prefers to break bones before administering the killing blow. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/)
[Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/)
[Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/), [Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/), [Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/): Grom carries the [key](/largeIronKey/) to Bauha's cell if you cannot open it normally. [Category:Crookspur characters](/categoryCrookspurCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Taskmaster Grom |image = Portrait Generic Ogre Guard Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Taskmaster Grom.png |caption = |race = Wilder |subrace = |creature = Ogre |gender = Male |culture = |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 13 |MIG = 20 |CON = 18 |DEX = 8 |PER = 8 |INT = 10 |RES = 16 |health = 420 |damage = 26-35 {{crush}} |accuracy = 76 |penetration = 10 |deflection = 52 |fortitude = 82 |reflex = 38 |will = 68 |dr = 8 |dr crush = 4 |dr pierce = 12 |dr burn = 12 |dr corrode = 4 |ability = [[Resistance: Intellect Afflictions]], [[Weakness: Dexterity Afflictions]], [[Sea Shanty]], [[Throw Jug]], [[To the Depths]] |location = [[Crookspur Dungeons]] |quests = [[A Shrewd Proposition]]
[[Cruel Cargo]]
[[Clearing Out Crookspur]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [[Large Iron Key]] |internalname = CRE_Ogre_Taskmaster |guid = afd9622f-119f-4817-8db9-94c040a57737 }} '''Taskmaster Grom''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== Grom is the pitiless ogre executioner of the Crookspur slaver port. He revels in his job and routinely torments captives with threats of death and mock executions. Nothing thrills him so much as the inevitable, periodic slave uprisings. After putting down such a revolt, the slavers turn to him to execute the ringleaders to discourage future resistance from the chattel. The executioner is not known for killing his victims quickly or cleanly, and prefers to break bones before administering the killing blow. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[A Shrewd Proposition]]
[[Cruel Cargo]]
[[Clearing Out Crookspur]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[A Shrewd Proposition]], [[Cruel Cargo]], [[Clearing Out Crookspur]]: Grom carries the [[Large Iron Key|key]] to Bauha's cell if you cannot open it normally. [[Category:Crookspur characters]]
title: Taskmaster Grom
